View on GitHub

KGQA-leaderboard

Repository to track the progress in Question Answering over Knowledge Graphs (KGQA), including the datasets and the current state-of-the-art for the most common KGQA tasks.

SimpleQuestionsWikidata

SimpleQuestionsWikidata[1] is a version of the SimpleQuestions dataset mapped to Wikidata.

This dataset can be downloaded via the link.

Leaderboard

References

[1] Diefenbach, Dennis, Thomas Tanon, Kamal Singh, and Pierre Maret. “Question answering benchmarks for wikidata.” In ISWC 2017. 2017.
